‡∑¥ sathara isawwa ‡∑¥: bodubala senawa saha gnyanasara himiyan ehe mehe pawena danuma ekama blog adawiyakata, enna godawadila yanna sathara isawwata kotas welada pala bodubala senawa saha gnyanasara himiyan hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage parajayata sampurna thiranathmaka sadakaya wuye oba wahansege halal wirodi wyaparaya kiwahoth niwaradiya.muslim prajawe bahuthara kamaththa himiwa thibu mahinda balawathwa nagi sitina awasthawaka hiti hatiyema aarambha wu oba sanwidhanaya ee sadaha gotabhaya mahathage sruju nayakathwayen pihitu wu sandhanayak lesa muslim prajawa wetha huwa dakwamin sanniwedanaya karamin mahinda mahathage jayagrahanaye thiranathmaka sadakayak wu muslim chanda winasha kirime kuta upakramaya sarthaka karagena ohuwa janadhipathi durayen panna damime palamu meheyuma itha sarthaka kara ganna ladi.
